visualize

public static void visualize(javax.swing.JDialog dialog)
Sets visualization for dialog.

Parameters:
dialog - The dialog to be visualized.

getPanel

public static javax.swing.JPanel getPanel(java.lang.String borderTitle,
                                          int layoutType)
Creates and returns panel depending on the given parameters.

Parameters:
borderTitle - The title to be set for the border of the panel. If null value is given, no border will be assigned.
layoutType - The layout type of panel.
Returns:
The created panel.

addComponent

public static void addComponent(javax.swing.JPanel panel,
                                java.awt.Component component,
                                int row,
                                int column,
                                int width,
                                int height)
Sets gridbag layout constraints and adds components to panel.

Parameters:
panel - The panel for the components to be added.
component - Component to be added into layout.
row - Y coordinate of the upper-left corner of the component.
column - X coordinate of the upper-left corner of the component.
width - Cell number captured by the component's width.
height - Cell number captured by the component's height.
